DOC.brief_summary: McGrath videolaryngoscopy avoids use Magill forceps nasotracheal intubation , thereby reduce intubation time complication , especially patient difficult airway . This study perform investigate whether McGrath videolaryngoscopy superior Macintosh laryngoscopy routine nasotracheal intubation expect normal airway , judge time intubation ease intubation .
